channel.title: Find the tools you need to market yourself and manage your brand as an author
channel.description: Find the tools you need to market yourself and manage your brand as an author

item.title: Why Self-Publish?
item.description:
Why Self-Publish?

The self publishing revolution has begun.  If you have a great idea for a book, you no longer need the approval of traditional gatekeepers.  You can edit and publish your own work.
